Articles.Content:
hello everyone.

like the title says I have this orbital maneuver node like that is too transparent for me to see.

I don't think is a bug in it self but I don't know how to change it and it kill the game for me.

If someone could help me out,thanks.

Also it's doesn't changes like it doesn't change colour,size or form and you can't really recreate it since it is there from the start. 

![fZBFlBil.png](http://i.imgur.com/fZBFlBil.png)

Computer Specs:

- OS: Windows 7 Home Premium
- Processor: Intel® Core i5-2300 cpu @2.80ghz 2.80ghz
- RAM: 6gb
- System Type 64-bit OS

The blue line is showing anti-aliasing effects lance0625, when this is enabled via the graphics card driver you can get the effect you see there, try disabling AA for KSP and using the built-in anti-aliasing in the settings screen instead.
